Description: Conical foot sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style or Grand Style pottery chalice; white slip; exterior: glazed streaky black; inscription on reserved underside.
Curator's comments: The number 772 is written in pencil on the underside of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 171, no. 61)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0652) (phase 2)
